about_the_game:
Composed and produced by Jeff van Dyck
Vocals by Angela van Dyck and Ella van Dyck
Guitar, Lute, Dulcimer and Mandolin by Shaun Trainer
Mastered by Dave Neil

01 Hand of Fate II (The Beginning)
02 The Game We Play
03 Deal of the Next Millennia
04 Voice of the Sun
05 Spiritual Rancor
06 Outer Demons
07 Broken

09 Another Devil

11 Until Midnight
12 Hero’s Battle
13 Deep Conflict
14 Tempus
15 Bad Hand
16 Kneel and Fray
17 Surly Towers
18 Space Canoe
19 Hand Over Your Lute
20 Doomhammer
21 Sisters of Murky

24 Morning Mist
25 The Defiant Ones
26 Violent Elephant

29 Wheel of Fate

33 Fatal Hand
34 Till We Meet Again

name: Hand of Fate 2 Soundtrack
short_description: The Hand of Fate 2 Soundtrack features nearly 2 hours of music composed and produced by the award winning Jeff van Dyck.
